titleStmt.title: A strange vvonder or a wonder in a vvoman, vvherein is plainely expressed the true nature of most women. Especially of some emminent women in this citie. Likewise a plaine discription of many mad tricks and slights lately performed by a zealous sister which was overcome with the Spirit. Written by I. H. gentleman.
titleStmt.author: I. H., Gentleman.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
